title: Le clown « undercover » (The Undercover Clown)
itunes:title: Le clown « undercover » (The Undercover Clown)
description:
As a nuclear engineer, David S. had a very serious job. But after discovering a passion for the French art of clowning, he decided to start leading a double life, doing everything in his power to keep his two different worlds from colliding.

A transcript of this episode is available at https://bit.ly/3H4Wn57.
